doc:
Brian Aherne https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brian_Aherne 0 William Brian de Lacy Aherne (2 May 1902 – 10 February 1986) was an Anglo-American actor of stage, screen, radio and television. He was one of the top cinema character actors in Hollywood from the 1930s to the 1950s.Aherne was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his performance as Maximilian I of Mexico in the film Juarez (1939) and had a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame at 1752 Vine Street. William_Brian de Lacy_Aherne ( 2_May_1902 – 10_February_1986 ) was an_Anglo-American_actor of stage_,_screen_,_radio_and_television . He was one of the_top_cinema_character_actors in Hollywood from the_1930s to the_1950s . Aherne was_nominated for an_Academy_Award for Best_Supporting_Actor for his_performance as Maximilian_I of Mexico in the_film_Juarez_(_1939_) and had a_star on the_Hollywood_Walk of Fame at 1752_Vine_Street .
